title: Sports Editor - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Editor Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Oversee another sports writer as well as several stringers. The primary coverage area includes three public high schools and two private schools. The job involves laying out sports pages...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
